Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

MILES_SPEAKER_TYPE

The basic type MILES_SPEAKER_TYPE specifies a speaker type to use for the 3D spacializing routines.

Fundamental Values

 Value  Description
 AIL_3D_2_SPEAKER specifies a normal set of stereo speakers. (Debugger value: 0).
 AIL_3D_HEADPHONE specifies headphones. (Debugger value: 1).
 AIL_3D_SURROUND specifies a set of 3 or more speakers connected through a surround sound system. (Debugger value: 2).
 AIL_3D_4_SPEAKER specifies a set of 4 speakers (quad-channel). (Debugger value: 3).


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_3D_speaker_type, AIL_set_3D_speaker_type
